Package com.gsm.service.impl

Class FabricServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.service.impl.FabricServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FabricService
    @Service
public class FabricServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FabricService
    The concrete implementation of the FabricService interface. This class orchestrates all business logic for the Fabric feature, including validation, data mapping, and persistence.

      • save

        @Transactional
public FabricDto save​(FabricDto dto)
        Saves a new fabric or updates an existing one.

        Use Case: Executed when the user saves the fabric form. This implementation ensures data integrity by validating uniqueness and correctly synchronizing the nested list of fabric colors.

        Specified by:
        save in interface FabricService
        Parameters:
        dto - The DTO containing the fabric data.
        Returns:
        The saved FabricDto.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
